verbose_text: Although the homozygous LKB1 S431A / S431A and LKB1 C433S / C433S mice exhibited no overt phenotypes, we found that the LKB1 C433S / C433S animals displayed lower levels of LKB1 at their membrane and, surprisingly, had significantly reduced basal, as well as stimulated, AMPK activity in all of the tissues and cells analysed.
